1: I am connected to a source of abundant growth.
2: I grow and thrive to produce abundant fruit.
3: I am renewed by the words I embrace.
4: I thrive and bear fruit by staying connected.
5: I thrive and grow when I stay connected to my source.
6: Staying connected brings growth and purpose.
7: I ask with confidence and receive what I desire.
8: I glorify my Father by bearing abundant fruit.
9: I love you as I am loved; stay in my love.
10: I enjoy love by following positive guidance.
12: I love and support others as I am loved.
13: I show my love by selflessly supporting my friends.
14: I create strong friendships by following guiding principles.
15: I share everything I learn with my friends.
16: I am chosen to create lasting positive impact through my actions.
17: I love and support one another.
18: Being true to myself brings me strength and understanding.
19: The world recognizes and values those who embrace their true identity.
20: Embrace truth, knowing that those who listen will support you.
21: I receive support and understanding for my beliefs.
22: I embrace understanding that brings clarity and honesty.
23: Loving others fosters connection and harmony in all relationships.
24: My actions inspire awareness and understanding in others.
25: I rise above unearned negativity and embrace love.
26: The Spirit of truth guides and assures me always.
27: I share my experiences to inspire others.
